definition: the act of interlocking or meshing, coordinate in such a way that all parts work together effectively
details:
noun
- the act of interlocking or meshing
= synonyms: interlocking, meshing, interlock
- an open fabric of string or rope or wire woven together at regular intervals
= synonyms: net, meshing, network, meshwork
- the topology of a network whose components are all connected directly to every other component
= synonyms: mesh topology
- contact by fitting together
= synonyms: meshing, engagement, interlocking
- the number of openings per linear inch of a screen
verb
- coordinate in such a way that all parts work together effectively
= synonyms: interlock
- entangle or catch in (or as if in) a mesh
= synonyms: enmesh, ensnarl
- keep engaged
= synonyms: lock, operate, engage
- work together in harmony
